data.what_is:
Clastic makes the process of attracting prospects to converting leads to creating customers - EASIER... OPTIMUM... and AUTOMATED... for every small business.
Clastic helps you design, execute, analyze and manage email campaigns that are engaging and really cost-effective. You also get in-built CRM that's perfect for your small business needs, without any charges. There is more! If you don't have a prospects list ready with you, no worries! You can dig into 3rd party contact database integrated within the tool and find target customers for your business. With lead nurturing you can truly make your sales funnel leak-proof and increase sales opportunities. The system performs with agility so as to enable quick campaign optimization, automated timely-execution and real-time performance reporting. 
Get a FREE TRIAL today to see how Clastic can help you outgrow your competition! Deployment: Web-based Support: Online. Business hours. Features Checklist: Contact Database, CRM Integration, Multi-campaign, Email Marketing, Lead Management, Lead Nurturing.
Get your free www.clastic.com

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Clastic?
The interface is one of the greatest sides of the product that helps to feel like it has been 5 years using the software. We majorly manage our email campaigns. Data exporting is working greatly that we can use the reporting that our board can monitor the processes in our business and sales. We also manage our social marketing channels effectively however, our email marketing is our priority, and these two work perfectly. Besides, a drip campaign is another great feature that we enjoy using. Having a free trial version is the important factor that helped us to determine how much the software can contribute to our business management.

What do you dislike about Clastic?
In-person and video training are not available which is preferable from point of our view as our team favors getting in-person training for using the software more effectively. Besides. having no option of windows desktop version could be a downside that it could be great if we could get the desktop version. The price is quite high in contrast to other products in the marketplace. Customer service is pain that the channels that the software offers to the customers are quite limited and inefficient.  Having no Help Desk, FAQ, Phone support and Chat is a major issue in this time that the companies would need to get help in case of face problems while implementing.

Recommendations to others considering Clastic:
Do not consider high price as the obstacle to go with Clastic

What problems is Clastic solving and how is that benefiting you?
We manage our social marketing platforms. We expand our business through it that we broadened our customer segment and overall audience. The reaction and click-through from email marketing that we conduct mirrored our sales numbers. Subscriber management is one of the great contributions that we could segment our audience and approach to them with a strategic perspective.
